actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A concurrent resolution directing the Secretary of Health and Human Services and the Commissioner of Social Security to immediately develop and present to the Congress a plan to correct the social security benefit disparity which has become known as the "notch" problem.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Declares that the Secretary of Health and Human Services and the Commissioner of Social Security should develop and present to Congress a plan to correct the benefit disparity caused by the 1977 changes in the social security retirement benefit formula.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution directing the Secretary of Health and Human Services and the Commissioner of Social Security to immediately develop and present to the Congress a plan to correct the social security benefit disparity which has become known as the "notch" problem.
